title: Tim | Cascade 2015
credits:
**CREATIVE DIRECTOR:** Giulia Castiello\
**MOTION DESIGNER:** Serena Paratore
description:
Telecom Italia (currently TIM) wanted a video motion graphics, for use and internal dissemination and presentation; object with a report of activities they have done to engage employees and making them partners of corporate business strategies.\
My role was to interpret this request, and the final effect was particularly emotional.\
I created the storyboard, I've illustrated the story and finally animated it.
